column4: can i ask some more? i trying to reinstall ubuntu to a new partition
and what happened?  Can you explain a little more?
you have to ask a question before we can help you.  You said you tried installing to a new partition, and?  What happened?  It didn't work?  it crashed?
are you dual booting?  or is the computer dedicated to Linux?  Also how much disk space do you have?
